description.en:
A community of people who love cryptocurrencies and blockchain, with a high level of expertise they can share with others.

At N1CE, experts (or specialists) receive votes and rewards from the community, creating a virtuous circle of crypto knowledge.

N1CE token is the cryptocurrency used to pay and earn on the platform, as well as govern it. You will be able to earn N1CE by doing simple daily tasks. The initial circulating supply will be 20 millions N1CE, distributed through airdrops, contests and other bounties. The total supply will be 100 millions N1CE.
